cc.setting
Interface ChineseCharacterTypeSetter

All Known Implementing Classes:
MergePieceSetter, SimpleAreaSetter, SimpleImageSetter, SimplePieceSetter
public interface ChineseCharacterTypeSetter

活字設定工具。將部件結構（ChineseCharacter）轉換成活字結構（ ChineseCharacterMovableType）。

Author:
Ihc

Method Summary
 ChineseCharacterMovableType setTzu(ChineseCharacterMovableTypeTzu parent, ChineseCharacterTzu chineseCharacterTzu)
          產生並初使化合體活字
 ChineseCharacterMovableType setWen(ChineseCharacterMovableTypeTzu parent, ChineseCharacterWen chineseCharacterWen)
          產生並初使化獨體活字
 

Method Detail

                                   ChineseCharacterWen chineseCharacterWen)

Parameters:
parent - 此活字結構的上層活字
chineseCharacterWen - 要轉化的文（獨體）部件
Returns:
獨體活字
